text: Junius Kwan-yiu Ho (born 4 June 1962) is a Hong Kong lawyer and politician. He is a former president of the Law Society of Hong Kong and chairman of the Tuen Mun Rural Committee. He was an elected member of the Tuen Mun District Council since 2015. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Chinese politicians
title: Junius Ho
